title: Love Island
lyrics:
Lyric 90idle - Love Island

[Romanization]

Close your eyes and feel the moonlight
uri dulmanui sigan soge
yeongwonhi kkaeji aneul kkumcheoreom
julgot nalkaropdeon mamdo
geu ane seumyeodeun apeumdo
kkaekkeuthage ssitgyeoga

(There's only you and me)
Come over I'll let you inside
stay the night be the right by my side
Girl I don't want anyone you're the one

I'd never let someone inside
but I wish you were by my side
Girl I don't want anyone you're the one

balkkeute daneun goyohan mulgyeol
joyonghi ullineun sumgyeol
There is only you and me
jabeun du songgiren sarangeul
hansum hanaen yaksogeul
seoroege neul jonjaehae

(There's only you and me)
Come over I'll let you inside
stay the night be the right by my side
Girl I don't want anyone you're the one

I'd never let someone inside
but I wish you were by my side
Girl I don't want anyone you're the one

On this island
don't worry 'bout the rest

[Hangeul]

Close your eyes and feel the moonlight

우리 둘만의 시간 속에

영원히 깨지 않을 꿈처럼

줄곧 날카롭던 맘도

그 안에 스며든 아픔도

깨끗하게 씻겨가



(There's only you and me)

Come over I'll let you inside

stay the night be the right by my side

Girl I don't want anyone you're the one



I'd never let someone inside

but I wish you were by my side

Girl I don't want anyone you're the one



발끝에 닿는 고요한 물결

조용히 울리는 숨결

There is only you and me

잡은 두 손길엔 사랑을

한숨 하나엔 약속을

서로에게 늘 존재해



(There's only you and me)

Come over I'll let you inside

stay the night be the right by my side

Girl I don't want anyone you're the one



I'd never let someone inside

but I wish you were by my side

Girl I don't want anyone you're the one



On this island

don't worry 'bout the rest
name: 90idle - Love Island
